GetHere.title: Why People Get Services From In Here?
GetHere.desc1: Our centers employ experienced specialists who treat each patient with attention. These are professionals who will become your partners in maintaining health.
GetHere.desc2: More than 4,000 qualified doctors of various specialties work in the medical centers of SM-Clinic, including more than 200 candidates of medical sciences, more than 20 doctors of medical sciences, 17 professors, 2 academicians of the Russian Academy of Medical Sciences, 9 associate professors and senior researchers.
GetHere.desc3: Our medical centers employ doctors of both the most sought-after medical specialties: general practitioners, cardiologists, urologists, gynecologists, ophthalmologists, otorhinolaryngologists, surgeons and others, as well as rare ones: geneticists, reproductive specialists, embryologists, hepatologists and others.
GetHere.desc4: Doctors specializing in the treatment of children from the first days of life to adulthood are receiving appointments in children's departments.

Choose.title: Why People Choose Us?
Choose.subTitle: We are
Choose.text: One of the largest networks of multidisciplinary medical centers for adults and children. The holding is in the top 5 private clinics according to Forbes, RBC, Vademecum and BusinesStat. We have been leading our history since 1993. Now we have 28 multidisciplinary clinics in Moscow, Moscow region, St. Petersburg, Ivanovo and Ryazan, which are open for you every day, including weekends and holidays.

Mission.title: Our Mission & Vision?
Mission.subTitle: Our Mission & Vision
Mission.text: The safety and health of our patients is our top priority regardless of the epidemiological situation, but now it is especially important to ensure the full protection of our patients and prevent the spread of the pandemic.

Service.title: How To Get Service?
Service.subTitle: Our service
Service.text: You can easily make an appointment by phone or just leave a request on the site! You can also just come to one of our centers, they will help you figure it out.

OurExpertDoctors.title: Our Expert Doctor
OurExpertDoctors.subTitle: Patients are treated by qualified doctors who have a long practice and wide knowledge in their field.

Preview.title: Meet with your best doctor here
Preview.subTitle: The high quality of medical care provided is the main priority of our work. Our medical center is constantly improving the management and quality control system, introducing best practices, taking into account the wishes and feedback of patients.

OurDepartments.title: Our Departments Best For You
OurDepartments.subTitle: The medical center operates in the format of a global family clinic. The scope of our activities includes all types of medical care: diagnosis, treatment, recovery and prevention.

Dental.title: Dental
Dental.description: A consultation with a dentist takes place in a pleasant, relaxed atmosphere. At the initial consultation, you will be offered all possible treatment options, from which you can choose the most suitable one.

advantages.4: Proven methods and effective methods of pain relief

Gynecology.title: Gynecology
Gynecology.description: KOLINIC employs highly qualified gynecologists with extensive experience in treating diseases of the female reproductive system: inflammatory and hormonal diseases, sexual conditions, pathologies of internal organs, age-related changes in the female condition, and others.

advantages.2: Application of modern technologies and knowledge in practice
advantages.3: A wide range of areas of gynecology

Laboratory.title: Laboratory
Laboratory.description: The network of multidisciplinary medical centers KOLINIK maintains its own laboratory.

advantages.1: High-precision equipment of the latest generation
advantages.2: Research in automatic mode and in the shortest possible time
advantages.3: The minimum probability of errors due to the 'human factor'

Cardiology.title: Cardiology
Cardiology.description: KOLINIK cardiologists successfully treat a wide range of cardiovascular diseases, which include diseases of the heart vessels, arteries and veins, many of which lead to circulatory failure and serious complications, heart attacks and strokes.

advantages.1: Diagnostics and treatment of cardiovascular diseases
advantages.2: Cardiologists of the highest category, candidates of medical sciences

Emergency.title: Emergency
Emergency.description: KOLINIK provides the following services for the provision of emergency medical care, medical support and transportation of patients:

advantages.6: All drugs needed for urgent home treatment

Sale.title: 30% Off Any Diagnostic Let's Check
Sale.subTitle: You can get upto 30% off for 45 days in here! So Contact with Us

OperationTheatre.title: World Best Operation Theatre In Here
OperationTheatre.subTitle: More than 3,500 qualified doctors of various specialties work in the medical centers of 'KOLINIK', including 202 candidates of medical sciences, 26 doctors of medical sciences, 17 professors, 2 academicians of the Russian Academy of Medical Sciences, 9 associate professors and senior researchers.

Provide.title: We Provided Best Service For Good Health
Provide.desc: The clinic accepts adults and children from birth. Each patient is provided with the necessary qualified assistance in various fields of medicine.
Provide.beneitsDesc: The KOLINIK Clinic employs international doctors who communicate fluently in English. Patients are ready to receive 22 departments and Competence Centers. In the modern operating block of the Clinic, high-tech operations are performed, there is a round-the-clock hospital for 28 beds, equipped with everything necessary for the comfort of patients.

Expirience.title: 30 Years More Services Experiences
Expirience.desc: Clinic KOLINIK is a family clinic, one of the leaders in private medicine, which is conveniently located in the historical center of St. Petersburg. Patients here have been receiving expert medical care for many years.

Review.title: Client Testimonial
Review.subTitle: Reviews about the clinic and doctors 'KOLINIK'

Pricing.title: Choose Pricing Plan
Pricing.subTitle: With a monthly subscription plan, you can always feel secure, anytime!

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subTitle: The medical center operates in the format of a universal family clinic. The scope of our activities includes all types of medical care: diagnosis, treatment, recovery and prevention.

cardiology.title: Cardiology
cardiology.description: Our doctors have all the possibilities for the diagnosis, treatment and prevention of pathologies of the cardiovascular system. The clinic has modern equipment for a quick and accurate diagnosis.

dental.title: Dental Surgery
dental.description: Our medical center offers modern methods of treating caries and other dental diseases in adults and children. Here you can take advantage of the latest achievements in the field of dentistry.

ophtalmology.title: Ophtalmology
ophtalmology.description: Our specialists with many years of experience monitor the implementation of the latest treatment methods in the field of ophthalmology. The technical base is represented by the latest generation medical equipment.

outpatient.title: Outpatient Surgery
outpatient.description: Thanks to the experience of doctors and modern equipment in the outpatient surgical department of our clinic, we are able to perform even complex operations and provide maximum patient comfort.

gynaecological.title: Gynaecological
gynaecological.description: The use of expert-class equipment allows you to accurately establish the diagnosis and identify pathologies at the initial stages. The health of the future generation depends on women's health, which is why our clinic pays special attention.

analysis.title: Laboratory Analysis
analysis.description: Laboratory diagnostics in our clinic includes a wide range of studies. The Medical Diagnostic Center collects all the main tests (blood, feces, urine, seminal fluid in men and more than a thousand paid services and studies).

About.title: About Company
About.text: Cooperation with leading research institutes and medical faculties of the largest universities in the country, studying and adapting foreign experience, introducing the latest medical techniques and service technologies. In 2017, the RUDN University Clinic was established on the basis of the Holding.
